data.title: All free Nintendo Switch games
data.meta_description: Fighting games are different from MMOs, MOBAs, and battle royales as they focus mostly on the beat-em-up approach like Super Smash Bros. Ultimate does. Here are all of the free fighting games on Switc
data.text:
Free Switch fighting games

Fighting games are different from MMOs, MOBAs, and battle royales as they focus mostly on the beat-em-up approach like Super Smash Bros. Ultimate does. Here are all of the free fighting games on Switch.

Brawlhalla

Brawlhalla features over 40 unique characters to choose from including characters from various franchises like Assassin's Creed, Adventure Time, Avatar: The Last Airbender, Rayman, and more. This free-to-play fighting game offers local competitions, single-player, or co-op modes. Play as your favorite characters and make them go head-to-head with other popular heroes.

Super Kirby Clash *

Kirby has been in the spotlight a lot since the success of Kirby and the Forgotten Land, but there's one of the puffball's games that you don't have to purchase to enjoy. In Super Kirby Clash, up to four players take on the role of four different colored Kirby characters with different fighting styles. Work together to fight your way through various levels and bosses. You can play multiplayer locally or online.

Fantasy Strike *

This is the perfect free game for fans of Street Fighter or Mortal Kombat. You participate in tournament-style matches that employ martial arts styles. In addition to fists, this can include swords, archery, and other weapons. Carefully calculate your moves to overtake your opponents and choose from multiple single-player modes.

Circle of Sumo: Online Rumble! *

Bringing together physics and fighting in the Sumo ring! Not only will you be going up against your opponent, but you've got to watch out for your ring too. The different environments have different challenges to overcome during your battle.

FIGHTING EX LAYER ANOTHER DASH *

This fighting game has a similar feel to Mortal Kombat, Street Fighter, and Soul Calibur. Choose your fighter and get in the ring! Each character has different moves and is ready to show them off. Once you master a particular player you can prove your prowess against others with local or online matches.

PunchMan Online *

PunchMan Online is a family-friendly game that allows you to play against several others online at the same time! Choose your character color and add accessories that you unlock as you progress. Compete with players around the world to beat their health bars down. The last one standing wins!
